lines.text: You know, eh, my grandmother died at Queen Adelaides. She said it was the happiest time of her life.
Well, I used to be a travel courier, but, eh I had to give up.
Why?
One night there were 15 ski instructors scratching at the door of my room.
Goodness!
But I wouldn't let them out.
Do you believe in love at first sight?
Well lets have a sight and I'll tell you.
I'm afraid I dropped the tomatoes.
Oh, that's alright.
And the sugar bags burst.
Yes I noticed how they felt.
What's that?
This, my friend, is a tiny little tablet of sodium bypenthathol. And we all know what that does, don't we?
What?
It loosens the libido, my friend. Liberates pent up passion. Releases a Niagra of lust.
Is it a sex stimulant as well?
Oh, not another one. What do you want? Aren't there any other girls in this hospital?
Aha, not with your combination of beauty and sensitivity. To be in your presence is to glow.
Well I'll make you a cup of coffee and then you can glow away.
